title: ryxhw4
text: package contains useful functions calculate correlation two variables. created part homework assignment QAC356.

title: ryxhw4
text: package 4 functions. One core function ryx() 3 generic S3 functions (print.ryx(), summary.ryx(), plot.ryx()) display output core function.

title: ryxhw4
text: ryx function core package. takes dataframe specified variables calculates correlations variables. function returns list 3 containing variables used dataframe correlation results.
code: data(mtcars) x <- ryx(mtcars, y = "mpg", x = c("wt", "disp")) x #> Correlations of mpg with #>  variable          r            p sigif #>        wt -0.8676594 1.293959e-10   *** #>      disp -0.8475514 9.380327e-10   ***

title: ryxhw4
text: print.ryx function displays output core ryx function simple table.
code: print(x) #> Correlations of mpg with #>  variable          r            p sigif #>        wt -0.8676594 1.293959e-10   *** #>      disp -0.8475514 9.380327e-10   ***

title: ryxhw4
text: summary.ryx function displays output core ryx function words
code: summary(x) #> Correlating mpg with wt disp #> The median absolute correlation was 0.858 with a range from -0.868 to -0.848 #> 2 out of 2 variables were significant at the p < 0.05 level.

title: ryxhw4
text: plot.ryx function displays output core ryx function dotchart graph
